title: S5 Ep18: Two Take Tuesday: Tuesday, February 1st, 2022
itunes:title: Two Take Tuesday: Tuesday, February 1st, 2022
description:
• Whoopi Goldberg slammed after saying Holocaust 'not about race' (NY Post) (17:13) 
  • Tom Brady officially retires after 22 legendary seasons (NY Post) (29:46) 
  • 'Grease' prequel series, 'Rise of the Pink Ladies,' reveals cast (NY Post) (34:09)
  • And Just Like That... Unveils Trailer for New Documentary to Be Released Alongside Season Finale (PEOPLE) (41:37) 
  • New York Times Buys Wordle for a Price in the 'Low-Seven Figures' (Variety) (46:30) 
Euphoria Recap (52:29)
Ru Paul's Drag Race Recap (56:04) 
Summer House Recap (1:00:13)

The Morning Toast with Claudia (@girlwithnojob) and Jackie Oshry (@jackieoshry)
